channel.title: 2018 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Sponsored as RubyWorld Conference 2018 sponsor
item.description: As a silver sponsor, we will support “RubyWorld Conference 2018” which will be held at Kunibiki Messe, Shimane Industrial Exchange Center on Thursday, November 1 and Friday, November 2, 2018.

item.title: Ruby camp 2018 summer and spring 2019 operation contracted from Shimane
item.description: On May 30, 2018, we were commissioned by Shimane Prefecture for summer 2018 and spring 2019 operations. We have been commissioned to operate Ruby training camp since 2011, and this is our 8th year.

item.title: Estimate and match-on service 'Drone Match' released by connecting the customer and the business operator of the loan
